headline: Ask HN: Why does FreeBSD do Releases the way the do?
description:
Can someone help me understand how/why FreeBSD does releases. It almost seem user hostile (unless you're just a FreeBSD developer wanting to hack on FreeBSD).

What I find odd is:

(a) there are 3 simultaneous production releases (13.0, 12.3, 12.2) - which seems confusing and lack of focus

(b) the development process is CURRENT > STABLE > BETA* > RC* > RELEASE. But the problem is, all developers just work on CURRENT. So if there is ever a problem on RELEASE, you basically won't get the fix.

(c) it seems logic to only run RELEASE in production, but the problem is - RELEASE is only support for 3 months after the next RELEASE. 3 months! [1]

(d) this creates a situation where companies basically have to fork FreeBSD just to use it in their production environment (and merge from CURRENT frequently). Netflix has to do this, but no all companies have the huge resources Netflix does [2]

(e) just the simple fact that freebsd.org list 4 releases on their homepage is alone confusing.

These problems has been long documented for over a decade (documented well by @rsync [3][4]), I just feel like I must be missing something obvious as to why FreeBSD does there releases so strangely.

[1] https://www.freebsd.org/security/#sup

[2] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=21867202

[3] https://lists.freebsd.org/pipermail/freebsd-hackers/2014-June/045319.html

[4] https://lists.freebsd.org/pipermail/freebsd-hackers/2012-January/037294.html
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 为什么FreeBSD的发布方式是这样的？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 為什麼FreeBSD的發佈方式是這樣的？
description_zh-Hans:
谁能帮助我理解FreeBSD是如何/为何进行发布的。

我觉得奇怪的是：

(a) 同时有三个生产版本（13.0，12.3，12.2）--这看起来很混乱，而且缺乏重点

(b) 开发过程是 CURRENT > STABLE > BETA* > RC* > RELEASE。但问题是，所有的开发者都只是在CURRENT上工作。

(c) 在生产中只运行 RELEASE 似乎符合逻辑，但问题是 - RELEASE 只支持下一个 RELEASE 之后的 3 个月。3个月! [<1]

(d) 这就造成了一种情况，即公司基本上必须分叉FreeBSD才能在他们的生产环境中使用它（并经常从CURRENT合并）。Netflix不得不这样做，但并不是所有的公司都有Netflix那样庞大的资源 [2]

(e) freebsd.org在其主页上列出4个版本的简单事实就令人困惑。

这些问题已经被记录了十年之久（@rsync[3][4]记录的很好），我只是觉得我一定错过了一些明显的东西，即为什么FreeBSD在发布时如此奇怪。

[1] https://www.freebsd.org/security/#sup

[2] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=21867202

[3] https://lists.freebsd.org/pipermail/freebsd-hackers/2014-June/045319.html

[4] https://lists.freebsd.org/pipermail/freebsd-hackers/2012-January/037294.html
description_zh-Hant:
誰能幫助我理解FreeBSD是如何/為何進行發佈的。

我覺得奇怪的是：

(a) 同時有三個生產版本（13.0，12.3，12.2）--這看起來很混亂，而且缺乏重點

(b) 開發過程是 CURRENT > STABLE > BETA* > RC* > RELEASE。但問題是，所有的開發者都只是在CURRENT上工作。

(c) 在生產中只運行 RELEASE 似乎符合邏輯，但問題是 - RELEASE 只支持下一個 RELEASE 之後的 3 個月。3個月! [<1]

(d) 這就造成了一種情況，即公司基本上必須分叉FreeBSD才能在他們的生產環境中使用它（並經常從CURRENT合併）。Netflix不得不這樣做，但並不是所有的公司都有Netflix那樣龐大的資源 [2]

(e) freebsd.org在其主頁上列出4個版本的簡單事實就令人困惑。

這些問題已經被記錄了十年之久（@rsync[3][4]記錄的很好），我只是覺得我一定錯過了一些明顯的東西，即為什麼FreeBSD在發佈時如此奇怪。

[1] https://www.freebsd.org/security/#sup

[2] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=21867202

[3] https://lists.freebsd.org/pipermail/freebsd-hackers/2014-June/045319.html
